</entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;WordPress Core 开始使用 SQLite 数据库</stitle>; <id>;https://blogiestools.com/wordpress-sqlite-database /</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T20:53:57.918870Z</更新>; <link href="https://blogiestools.com/wordpress-sqlite-database/"/>; <作者>; <名称>; JPLeRouzic</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JPLeRouzic</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blogiestools. com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/WordPress-Core-using-SQLite-Database.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;WordPress 宣布将开始在 WordPress 核心中使用 SQLite 数据库进行测试。最初在 WordPress 中使用独立插件支持 SQLite。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#wordpress-core-to-start-using-sqlite-database" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36884806" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;Overture 地图基金会发布开放地图数据集</stitle>; <id>;https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map-dataset/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T15:53:57.919711Z</更新>; <link href="https://overturemaps.org/overture-maps-foundation-releases-first-world-wide-open-map-dataset/" />; <author>; <name>;chippy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=chippy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src ="https://overturemaps.org/wp-content/uploads/sites/16/2023/07/overture_places-1024x641.png" style="宽度：220px； height: 138px;" />;<br />;Overture 地图基金会发布了第一个开放地图数据集，其中包括全球近 6000 万个地点的四层开放地图数据。该数据集将成为导航和定位的基础元素 -基于应用程序。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#overture-maps-foundation-releases-open-map-dataset" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36879461" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;培养新想法诞生的心态</stitle>; <id>;https://www.henrikkarlsson.xyz/p/good-ideas </id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T19:53:57.920543Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.henrikkarlsson.xyz/p/good-ideas"/>; <作者>; <名称>; savagejohn</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=savagejohn</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn. com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F4697c31d-2502-48d2-b6c1- 11e5ea97536f_2560x2174.jpeg"样式="宽度：220px； height: 187px;" />;<br />;2010年代初，为初创公司创始人提供联合办公空间和共享生活的想法很流行。然而，Y Combinator总裁Sam Altman认为，不提供联合办公空间实际上有帮助培养伟大的想法。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#cultivating-a-state-of-mind-where-new-ideas-are-born" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36883436" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：继续 – 开源编码自动驾驶仪</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ continuedev/继续</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T20:53:57.921852Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/continuedev/continue"/>; <作者>; <名称>;sestinj </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sestinj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets .com/6277dfc2dade35415fed44127288ab91343e3e6c914f313c51140cafc718931b/continuedev/继续”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Continue 是一个用于软件开发的开源自动驾驶仪，它将 ChatGPT 的强大功能引入您的 IDE。它需要 Python 3.8 或更高版本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat .io/#show-hn-continue-open-source-coding-autopilot" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36882146" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;解析 Google 的网络环境完整性规范</stitle>; <id>;https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/</id>; <updated>;2023-07 -26T16:53:57.923414Z</updated>; <link href="https://vivaldi.com/blog/googles-new-dangerous-web-environment-integrity-spec/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dagurp </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dagurp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://vivaldi.com /wp-content/uploads/Toxic_google-980x551.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;Google 正在制定新的网络环境完整性规范，该规范引起了争议。该规范旨在为网站提供 API 来确定所使用的浏览器和平台是否可信。但是，提议的解决方案被认为很糟糕，并且已与网站的 DRM 进行了比较。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unpacking-googles-web-environment-integrity-specification" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875940" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;一名撰稿人冒充通灵者骗取受害者 2 亿美元</stitle>; <id>;https ://thewalrus.ca/the-greatest-scam-ever-writing/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T19:53:57.924935Z</更新>; <link href="https://thewalrus.ca /the-greatest-scam-ever-writing/"/>; <author>; <name>;firstbase</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=firstbase</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://walrus-assets.s3.amazonaws.com/img/Untitled-1-1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;蒙特利尔一名文案作者冒充通灵者，骗取受害者2亿美元。他利用具有挑衅性的文案推销自助指南和通灵服务，吸引超过100万人将钱寄到交换虚假承诺。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-copywriter-swindled-victims-out-of-200m-by-pretending-to-be-a-psychic" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36883668" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ Entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;智能合约安全领域指南</stitle>; <id>;https://scsfg。 io/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:53:57.926951Z</更新>; <link href="https://scsfg.io/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;dmuhs </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dmuhs</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;智能合约安全领域指南是一个免费资源，旨在提供知识、编写安全智能合约的见解和最佳实践。它是独立、公正的，并且不需要个人信息即可访问。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#smart-contract-security-field-guide" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36879991" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;销售车牌位置和分析数据的数据经纪人</stitle>; <id>;https://www.tlo.com/vehicle-sightings</id>; <更新>;2023-07 -26T17:53:57.927829Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.tlo.com/vehicle-sightings"/>; <作者>; <name>;JohnMakin</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=JohnMakin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#data-brokers- sell-license -plate-location-and-analytics-data" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881133" target="_blank" >;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;BasicBlocker：ISA 重新设计使 Spectre-Immune CPU 更快（2021）</stitle>; <id>;https://arxiv.org/abs/2007.15919</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T18:53:57.929591Z</updated>; < link href="https://arxiv.org/abs/2007.15919"/>; <author>; <name>;PaulHoule</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://static.arxiv.org/static/browse/0.3.4/images/arxiv-logo-fb.png" style="width ：220像素； height: 129px;" />;<br />;最近的研究揭示了越来越多的微架构攻击，这些攻击利用推测执行（现代处理器的标准功能）。建议和部署的对策涉及各种编译器更新、固件更新和硬件更新。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#basicblocker-isa-redesign-to-make-spectre-immune-cpus-faster-2021" target="_blank">;[摘要]</ a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36881989" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base= "https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;MOS 6502 非法操作码如何工作</stitle>; <id>;https://www.pagetable.com/?p= 39</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T11:53:57.930455Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.pagetable.com/?p=39"/>; <作者>; <名称>; hasheddan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hasheddan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.hasheddan">; weihenstephan.org/~michaste/pagetable/6502/6502_small.png" style="width: 220px; height: 271px;" />;<br />;MOS 6502 的原始 NMOS 版本用于 Commodore 64、Apple II 和任天堂娱乐系统 (NES) 等计算机，因其非法操作码而闻名。这些操作码虽然未由架构定义，但仍然可以执行有用的功能。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-mos-6502-illegal-opcodes-work" target="_blank">;[summary ]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875816" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;稳定扩散 XL 1.0</stitle>; <id>;https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/ 26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generating-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:53:57.931319Z</更新>; <链接 href="https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/26/stability-ai-releases-its-latest-image-generate-model-stable-diffusion-xl-1-0/"/>; <作者>; <name>;gslin</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslin</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// /techcrunch.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/04/064.jpg?w=600" style="width: 220px; height: 147px;" />;<br />;Stability AI 发布了 Stable Diffusion XL 1.0，这是迄今为止最先进的文本到图像模型。与之前的模型相比，该模型可提供鲜艳且准确的颜色、更好的对比度、阴影和照明。它可以在几秒钟内生成完整的 1 兆像素分辨率图像，并且可自定义以微调概念和样式。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#stable-diffusion-xl-1-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880756" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究表明等长运动最适合降低血压</stitle>; <id >;https://bjsm.bmj.com/content/early/2023/07/02/bjsports-2022-106503</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T20:53:57.932205Z</更新>; <link href ="https://bjsm.bmj.com/content/early/2023/07/02/bjsports-2022-106503"/>; <作者>; <名称>;cyoukins </名称>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=cyounkins</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://bjsm.bmj.com/sites/default/files/highwire/bjsports/ 57/15.cover-source.jpg" style="width: 220px;身高：294px;" />;<br />;传统的有氧运动训练仍然是治疗高血压的主要推荐运动方式。等长运动训练是降低收缩压和舒张压最有效的模式。<a href= “https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-suggests-isometric-exercises-best-for-reducing-blood-Pressure” target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36884118" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;家庭录音正在扼杀音乐：当音乐行业对盒式磁带发动战争时</stitle>; <id>;https://www.openculture.com/2023/07 /home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette-tape.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T07:53:57.933066Z< /更新>; <link href="https://www.openculture.com/2023/07/home-taping-is-killing-music-when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette- Tape.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;rcarmo</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=rcarmo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html" >;<img src="https://cdn8.openculture.com/2023/07/24205918/tometaping.jpg" style="宽度：220px; height: 143px;" />;<br />;20 世纪 80 年代英国臭名昭著的“家庭录音正在扼杀音乐”运动的目标人群是那些通过广播录制歌曲而不是购买唱片的人。然而，该运动收效甚微，并且许多人认为这是胡言乱语。家庭录音和盒式磁带在当时的音乐消费和文化中发挥了重要作用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#home-taping-is-killing-music- when-the-music-industry-waged-war-on-the-cassette" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36874275" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;人们为软件付费的世界</stitle>; <id>;https://1sub.dev/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-26T10:53:57.933916Z</updated>; <link href= “https://1sub.dev/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;robalni </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=robalni</uri>; </作者>; < content type="html">;软件开发必须以某种方式获得资金。 1Sub.dev 试图通过让开发者合作来为用户提供更多的钱来解决这个问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-world-where-people-pay-for-software" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36875513" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;太多的白日梦对我的影响</stitle>; <id>;https://sunghoyahng.substack.com/p/how-too-much-daydreaming-affected< /id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T13:53:57.934780Z</更新>; <link href="https://sunghoyahng.substack.com/p/how-too-much-daydreaming-affected"/>; <作者>; <name>;SunghoYahng</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=SunghoYahng</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/f_auto,q_auto:best,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsunghoyahng.substack.com%2Ftwitter%2Fsubscribe-card.jpg%3Fv%3D323842631%26version%3D9"样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：115像素；” />;<br />;我相信我正在经历一种称为适应不良白日梦（MD）的认知现象。它没有得到官方认可，但它极大地影响了我的生活和生产力。我的白日梦无处不在，干扰了我的日常工作，让我很难集中注意力。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-too-much-daydreaming-affected-me" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36860570" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;人们过分强调“减少、再利用、回收”的回收方面</stitle>; <id>;https://futurism.com/the-byte/scientists-recycling -backfired</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T10:53:57.936506Z</更新>; <link href="https://futurism.com/the-byte/scientists-recycling-backfired"/>; <作者>; <name>;gsky</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gsky</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https: //futurism.com/_next/image?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwp-assets.futurism.com%2F2023%2F07%2Fscientists-recycling-backfired.jpg&w=2048&q=75" style="width: 220px; height : 116 像素;" />;<br />;回收活动掩盖了生产过剩的问题，并淡化了其他废物减少策略。许多人错误地认为回收免狱卡，导致混乱和日益严重的废物生产灾难。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-over-emphasize-the-recycling-aspect-of-reduce-reuse-recycle" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36873516" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;科学家在佛罗里达群岛发现新的等足类动物物种</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07 -scientists-isopod-species-florida-keys.html</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:53:57.937373Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023- 07-scientists-isopod-species-florida-keys.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;wglb</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=wglb</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b-cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/scientists-discover-ne-5.jpg" style="width ：220px；高度：146px；” />;<br />;一个国际科学家小组在佛罗里达群岛发现了一种新的海洋加密动物物种。新发现的物种，Gnathia jimmybuffetti，是甲壳类等足类动物的成员。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#scientists-discover-new-isopod-species-in-the-florida-keys" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36871446" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Mold 2.0</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0</id >; <更新>;2023-07-26T12:53:57.938238Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0"/>; <作者>; <名称>;fomine3</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fomine3</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph .githubassets.com/afd44f1e96aebe8e924c22adeefc6fc7c2e1d9a3707116804f162bb6a567c4c1/rui314/mold/releases/tag/v2.0.0" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Mold 2.0.0 是我们高速链接器的新主要版本。为了扩大我们的用户群，我们已将许可证从 AGPL 转换为 MIT。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#mold-2-0" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36876783" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;研究表明草甘膦会损害大黄蜂的学习</stitle>; <id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impairs-bumblebees.html</id>; <更新>;2023 -07-26T16:53:57.939096Z</更新>; <link href="https://phys.org/news/2023-07-glyphosate-impairs-bumblebees.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;PaulHoule< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=PaulHoule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx1.b- cdn.net/csz/news/800a/2023/glyphosate-impairs-lea.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：96px；" />;<br />;康斯坦茨大学的生物学家发现，接触草甘膦的熊蜂会损害厌恶学习能力。这种学习障碍可能会增加觅食者的死亡率，并对群体的成功产生负面影响。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-shows-glyphosate-impairs-learning-in-bumblebees" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https: //news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880639" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat. io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;西尼德·奥康纳去世</stitle>; <id>;https://www.irishtimes.com/culture/music/2023/07/26/sinead- oconnor-acclaimed-dublin-singer-dies-ged-56/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T17:53:57.939883Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.irishtimes.com/ culture/music/2023/07/26/sinead-oconnor-acclaimed-dublin-singer-dies-ged-56/"/>; <author>; <name>;jbegley</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=jbegley</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.irishtimes.com/resizer/bJaZZVEKH0AVWZ3-I4peNw7aBK8=/600x400/filters：格式（jpg）：质量（70）/cloudfront-eu-central-1.images.arcpublishing.com/irishtimes/4ERWPSLUXBEJLHXRGQYHXOZ2DI.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;以热门单曲“Nothing Compares 2 U”而闻名的都柏林表演者西尼德·奥康纳 (Sinead O'Connor) 去世。她发行了 10 张录音室专辑，并在她的职业生涯中获得了无数奖项。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sinead-oconnor-has-died" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36881814" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;内存复制狩猎</stitle>; <id>;https://tigerbeetle.com/blog/2023-07-26-copy-hunting/</id>; <更新>;2023-07- 26T12:53:57.940701Z</updated>; <link href="https://tigerbeetle.com/blog/2023-07-26-copy-hunting/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;polyrand</name>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=polyrand</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://tigerbeetle.com/assets/matklad. webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：220px；" />;<br />;LLVM IR 是理解和优化代码的强大工具。它提供了接近汇编语言的低级代码表示，但也具有使其更加人性化的高级功能。通过分析 LLVM IR，开发人员可以识别并优化性能问题，例如隐式内存复制和不必要的代码重复。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#memory-copy-hunting" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36876396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;JEP 400：默认为 UTF-8</stitle>; <id>;https://openjdk.org/jeps/400</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:53:57.941602Z </更新>; <link href="https://openjdk.org/jeps/400"/>; <作者>; <name>;znpy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =znpy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;指定 UTF-8 作为标准 Java API 的默认字符集。此更改可确保所有实现、操作系统、区域设置和配置之间的行为一致，从而使 Java 程序更具可预测性和可移植性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#jep-400-utf-8-by-default" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36880069" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;重新思考窗口管理</stitle>; <id>;https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/2023/07/26/rethinking-window-management/</id >; <更新>;2023-07-26T16:53:57.942374Z</更新>; <link href="https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/2023/07/26/rethinking-window-management/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ayoisaiah</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ayoisaiah</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src=" https://blogs.gnome.org/tbernard/files/2023/07/2023-04-26-17-29-38-132-825x510.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：136px；" />;<br />;窗口管理是计算领域长期存在的挑战。随着窗口数量和大小的增加，传统的窗口系统存在局限性。 GNOME 设计团队一直致力于开发一种名为 Mosaic 的新窗口管理模式，它结合了平铺和浮动的最佳部分。它旨在提供一种默认行为，根据应用程序和可用屏幕空间自动调整窗口位置和大小。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#rethinking-window-management" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36880235" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;波音公司在 Starliner 上损失了 1.1B 美元，且看不到载人飞行</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/boeing-has-now-lost -1-1-billion-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T15:53:57.943126Z</更新>; <link href="https ://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/boeing-has-now-lost-1-1-billion-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;Brajeshwar</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Brajeshwar</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2022/05/Photo-May-18-3-55-30-PM-800x534.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：147px；" />;<br />;波音公司的 Starliner 计划遭受了额外损失，美国宇航局尚未确定载人航天器的潜在发射日期。该计划总共损失了 11 亿美元，主要是由于发射延迟和技术问题。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#boeing-has-now-lost-1-1b-on-starliner-with-no-crew-flight-in-sight" target="_blank">; [摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36879769" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < Entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;2023 年第二季度元收入同比增长 11%</stitle>; <id>;https://twitter .com/stonksnews/status/1684295301551517697</id>; <更新>;2023-07-26T20:53:57.944688Z</更新>; <link href="https://twitter.com/stonksnews/status/1684295301551517697"/>; <author>; <name>;vthallam</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=vthallam</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;出了点问题，但是别担心——让我们再试一次。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#meta-q2-2023-revenue-is-up-11-yoy" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36884380" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
